verses.verse: הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> I am going שֹׁלֵחַ֙ <WH7971> Behold I will send מַלְאָכִ֔י <WH4397> my messenger וּפִנָּה־ <WH6437> and he shall prepare דֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way לְפָנָ֑י <WH6440> before וּפִתְאֹם֩ <WH6597> shall suddenly יָב֨וֹא <WH935> come אֶל־ <WH413> to his הֵיכָל֜וֹ <WH1964> to his temple הָאָד֣וֹן ׀ <WH113> me and the Lord אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you מְבַקְשִׁ֗ים <WH1245> whom ye seek וּמַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> even the messenger הַבְּרִ֜ית <WH1285> of the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> you חֲפֵצִים֙ <WH2655> whom ye delight הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold בָ֔א <WH935> in behold he shall come אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

וּמִ֤י <WH4310> who מְכַלְכֵּל֙ <WH3557> But who may abide אֶת־ <WH853> י֣וֹם <WH3117> the day בּוֹא֔וֹ <WH935> of his coming וּמִ֥י <WH4310> who הָעֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> ? and who shall stand בְּהֵרָֽאוֹת֑וֹ <WH7200> when he appeareth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הוּא֙ <WH1931> he כְּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire מְצָרֵ֔ף <WH6884> ? for he [is] like a refiner's וּכְבֹרִ֖ית <WH1287> soap מְכַבְּסִֽים׃ <WH3526> and like fullers'

וְיָשַׁ֨ב <WH3427> And he shall sit מְצָרֵ֤ף <WH6884> [as] a refiner וּמְטַהֵר֙ <WH2891> and purifier כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְטִהַ֤ר <WH2891> and he shall purify אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the sons לֵוִי֙ <WH3878> of Levi וְזִקַּ֣ק <WH2212> and purge אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> כַּזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> them as gold וְכַכָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> and silver וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מַגִּישֵׁ֥י <WH5066> that they may offer מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> an offering בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> in righteousness

וְעָֽרְבָה֙ <WH6149> be pleasant לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> Then shall the offering יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וִירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem כִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> as in the days עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> of old וּכְשָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years קַדְמֹנִיּֽוֹת׃ <WH6931> and as in former

וְקָרַבְתִּ֣י <WH7126> And I will come near אֲלֵיכֶם֮ <WH413> to you לַמִּשְׁפָּט֒ <WH4941> to you to judgment וְהָיִ֣יתִי ׀ <WH1961> become עֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness מְמַהֵ֗ר <WH4116> and I will be a swift בַּֽמְכַשְּׁפִים֙ <WH3784> against the sorcerers וּבַמְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <WH5003> and against the adulterers וּבַנִּשְׁבָּעִ֖ים <WH7650> swearers לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> and against false וּבְעֹשְׁקֵ֣י <WH6231> and against those that oppress שְׂכַר־ <WH7939> in [his] wages שָׂ֠כִיר <WH7916> the hireling אַלְמָנָ֨ה <WH490> the widow וְיָת֤וֹם <WH3490> and the fatherless וּמַטֵּי־ <WH5186> and that turn aside גֵר֙ <WH1616> the stranger וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יְרֵא֔וּנִי <WH3372> [from his right] and fear אָמַ֖ר <WH559> not me saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> For I [am] the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> not שָׁנִ֑יתִי <WH8138> I change וְאַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> O בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> not therefore ye sons יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not כְלִיתֶֽם׃ <WH3615> are not consumed

לְמִימֵ֨י <WH3117> Even from the days אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1> of your fathers סַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH5493> ye are gone away מֵֽחֻקַּי֙ <WH2706> from mine ordinances וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not שְׁמַרְתֶּ֔ם <WH8104> and have not kept שׁ֤וּבוּ <WH7725> [them] Return אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me וְאָשׁ֣וּבָה <WH7725> unto me and I will return אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> to you אָמַ֖ר <WH559> unto you saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> But ye said בַּמֶּ֥ה <WH4100> How נָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> Wherein shall we return

הֲיִקְבַּ֨ע <WH6906> rob אָדָ֜ם <WH120> Will a man אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> angels כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you קֹבְעִ֣ים <WH6906> Wherein have we robbed אֹתִ֔י <WH853> וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> me But ye say בַּמֶּ֣ה <WH4100> How קְבַעֲנ֑וּךָ <WH6906> robbed הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֖ר <WH4643> thee? In tithes וְהַתְּרוּמָֽה׃ <WH8641> and offerings

בַּמְּאֵרָה֙ <WH3994> with a curse אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> You נֵֽאָרִ֔ים <WH779> Ye [are] cursed וְאֹתִ֖י <WH853> אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you קֹבְעִ֑ים <WH6906> for ye have robbed הַגּ֖וֹי <WH1471> me [even] this whole nation כֻּלּֽוֹ׃ <WH3605> the whole

הָבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> Bring אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֜ר <WH4643> ye all the tithes אֶל־ <WH413> in בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in mine house הָאוֹצָ֗ר <WH214> into the storehouse וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> become טֶ֙רֶף֙ <WH2964> that there may be meat בְּבֵיתִ֔י <WH1004> my house וּבְחָנ֤וּנִי <WH974> and prove נָא֙ <WH4994> now בָּזֹ֔את <WH2063> me now herewith אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֧א <WH3808> I will not אֶפְתַּ֣ח <WH6605> if I will not open לָכֶ֗ם אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֲרֻבּ֣וֹת <WH699> you the windows הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וַהֲרִיקֹתִ֥י <WH7324> and pour you out לָכֶ֛ם בְּרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> a blessing עַד־ <WH5704> until בְּלִי־ <WH1097> corruption דָֽי׃ <WH1767> that [there shall] not [be room] enough

וְגָעַרְתִּ֤י <WH1605> And I will rebuke לָכֶם֙ בָּֽאֹכֵ֔ל <WH398> the devourer וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יַשְׁחִ֥ת <WH7843> for your sakes and he shall not destroy לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> the fruits הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of your ground וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor תְשַׁכֵּ֨ל <WH7921> cast her fruit לָכֶ֤ם הַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <WH1612> neither shall your vine בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> before the time in the field אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

וְאִשְּׁר֥וּ <WH833> shall call you blessed אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> And all nations כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תִהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land חֵ֔פֶץ <WH2656> for ye shall be a delightsome אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts ס

חָזְק֥וּ <WH2388> have been stout עָלַ֛י <WH5921> against דִּבְרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1697> Your words אָמַ֣ר <WH559> against me saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> Yet ye say מַה־ <WH4100> What נִּדְבַּ֖רְנוּ <WH1696> What have we spoken עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> against

אֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> Ye have said שָׁ֖וְא <WH7723> It [is] vain עֲבֹ֣ד <WH5647> to serve אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God וּמַה־ <WH4100> and what בֶּ֗צַע <WH1215> and what profit כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֙רְנוּ֙ <WH8104> [is it] that we have kept מִשְׁמַרְתּ֔וֹ <WH4931> his ordinance וְכִ֤י <WH3588> for הָלַ֙כְנוּ֙ <WH1980> and that we have walked קְדֹ֣רַנִּ֔ית <WH6941> mournfully מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> appointed time

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> we מְאַשְּׁרִ֣ים <WH833> happy זֵדִ֑ים <WH2086> the proud גַּם־ <WH1571> only נִבְנוּ֙ <WH1129> are set up עֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> yea they that work רִשְׁעָ֔ה <WH7564> wickedness גַּ֧ם <WH1571> also בָּחֲנ֛וּ <WH974> yea [they that] tempt אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God וַיִּמָּלֵֽטוּ׃ <WH4422> are even delivered

אָ֧ז <WH227> Then נִדְבְּר֛וּ <WH1696> spake often יִרְאֵ֥י <WH3372> feared יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶת־ <WH854> for רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> to another וַיַּקְשֵׁ֤ב <WH7181> hearkened יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD וַיִּשְׁמָ֔ע <WH8085> and heard וַ֠יִּכָּתֵב <WH3789> was written סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> [it] and a book זִכָּר֤וֹן <WH2146> of remembrance לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before לְיִרְאֵ֣י <WH3372> fear יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וּלְחֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH2803> and that thought שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> upon his name

וְהָ֣יוּ <WH1961> become לִ֗י אָמַר֙ <WH559> And they shall be mine saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לַיּ֕וֹם <WH3117> in that day אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> when I make up סְגֻלָּ֑ה <WH5459> my jewels וְחָמַלְתִּ֣י <WH2550> and I will spare עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after יַחְמֹ֣ל <WH2550> spareth אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> them as a man עַל־ <WH5921> his own בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his own son הָעֹבֵ֥ד <WH5647> that serveth אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְשַׁבְתֶּם֙ <WH7725> Then shall ye return וּרְאִיתֶ֔ם <WH7200> and discern בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> between the righteous לְרָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> and the wicked בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between עֹבֵ֣ד <WH5647> between him that serveth אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God לַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who לֹ֥א <WH3808> does not עֲבָדֽוֹ׃ <WH5647> and him that serveth ס
